title: Heavy slab serif on Stereo MCs "Double Bubble" album cover
content:
I'm definitely overlooking something, because I can't seem to figure out this one. I'm hesitating if this could be [Aldo Novarese](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020225742/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Aldo%20Novarese)'s [Colossalis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020225742/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/colossalis-be/), but it somehow feels a bit off. What do you guys think?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020225742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Stereo-MCs_Double-bubble_5645.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Tanker? (I need to look for a sample...)
Um, how about [Soho](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020225742/http:/www.linotype.com/3273/soho.html)? Probably not a perfect match, but very nice and it seems pretty close?
Hmm, why are we using dumb quotes on TYPOPHILE??? See thread title. Shame on you, Yves! ;-)
